message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,000. This is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your life.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $10,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $10,000 is still a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9,500. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your life.
